short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces text referring to COVID-19 with explosive diarrhea.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: COVID news can be upsetting and cause stress. This extension will infuse a little comedy into your news feed by replacing references to "COVID-19" or "Coronavirus" with "explosive diarrhea".
